channel.title: Simple Invoices Google Group
channel.description: This is the mailing list for simpleinvoices.sf.net

item.title: Simple Invoices news: 2006 10 01
item.description:
Hi All,
quick news re Simple Invoices
Im in the process of moving our development site from cvsdude.com to
google ([link])
1- the moving of the subversion server is complete, our subveriosn
server is now hosted at google
refer: [link]
item.author: simpleinvoices@googlegroups.com

item.title: SimpleInvoices 20060927 release; Editable invoices!!
item.description:
Hi All,
finally, invoices that you create can now be edited!!!
pretty much since Simple Invoices was first release back near the
start of the year one of the main features missing was the ability to
edit invoices
Note; you cant yet add more items into an invoice when your editing
it, this will change in the future
item.author: simpleinvoices@googlegroups.com

item.title: Simple Invoices new 2006 09 26
item.description:
Hi All,
quick news update for Simple Invoices
1. Editable invoices
- after many months of thinking about this, editable invoices are
just around the corner :) - i finally got off my a$$ and got this
coded over the weekend. This will be included in the next release -
sometime later this week,
- Note: this is an inital implementation, so basically you can most
item.author: simpleinvoices@googlegroups.com

item.title: Re: error trying to login
item.description:
Hi,
there was a small problem with the latest SimpleInvoices-20060920
to fix this, open up the file index.php and remove the line
include('./auth.php');
which a few lines from the top of the file
I left this line in by mistake
or go to
[link]
and download the latest relase which has this issue fixed.
item.author: simpleinvoices@googlegroups.com

item.title: error trying to login
item.description:
Hi there,
Downloaded 20060920 stable. Following the ReadMe.html I installed
the MySQL database and after finishing the setup and testing I tried to
login to the system using
[link]
I got the login screen and when entering the username and password and
clicking the login button I get the following Query failed. Table
item.author: simpleinvoices@googlegroups.com

item.title: Simple Invoices 20060920: TinyMCE added
item.description:
Hi All,
just a quick notice, Simple Ivnoices 2060920 has been released.
The new feature is the use of TinyMCE ([link])
in the new invoices pages.
TinyMCE is a javascript HTML editor - meaning you now get gmail rich
formatting like features in various screens - which should make
item.author: simpleinvoices@googlegroups.com

item.title: Simple Invoices 2006 09 18: client accounts work finished
item.description:
Hi All,
Simple Invoices 2006 09 18 has been release !!
I had alot of fun over the weekend hacking on Simple Invoices, this
release rounds up the work on 'Client Accounts" and introduces to new
terms into the use of Simple Invoices.
The main features of this release is the concept of invoice 'Age' and 'Aging'
item.author: simpleinvoices@googlegroups.com

item.title: error in the latest release
item.description:
Hi All,
unfortunately the simpleinvoices_20060913.zip i uploaded onto
souceforge the other day is stuffed
you'll be able to grab the real version from
[link] in a few
hours after ive double checked everthing
im not having a good run with the releases lately :)
item.author: simpleinvoices@googlegroups.com

item.title: update
item.description:
Hi All.
guess who forgot to checkin one of the changes for the auto-complete stuff :)
has been checked in now and an update simpleinvoice 20060691-1 release
has been put up on sourceforge
now the demo at :
[link]
will work correctly
item.author: simpleinvoices@googlegroups.com

item.title: Simple Invoices 2006 09 13
item.description:
Hi All,
Simple Invoices 2006 09 13 has been released !
The main new stuff in this release is the improvement to the Process
Payments screen, The Invoice ID field received some jquery
magic([link]) is an auto-complete
field - This mean say if you have 12 invoices in your database - when
item.author: simpleinvoices@googlegroups.com

item.title: Simple Invoices demo site update
item.description:
Hi All,
Quick update, the Simple Invoices demo site
([link]) has been upgrade to the latest
release 20060909.
Cheers
Justin
item.author: simpleinvoices@googlegroups.com

item.title: Simple Invoices 20060909 release
item.description:
Hi All,
After a fair bit of work Simple Invoices 2006 09 09 has finally been
released. The main new features of this release is the implemetation
of 'Client Accounts' stage 2 - refer the wiki page
([link])
for more info
Client Accounts progress is going quite well - were on track to get
item.author: simpleinvoices@googlegroups.com

item.title: Simple Invoices news: Sep 03 2006
item.description:
Hi All,
quick update re Simple Invoices.
Stage 2 of Simple Invoices is about 50% done and checked into subversion, we
should be able to do a release next week with this stage finished.
also Ive update the Simple Invoices website, thanks to Stuart Brown from
[link] for allowing me to borrow their css
item.author: simpleinvoices@googlegroups.com

item.title: Simple Invoices 20060825
item.description:
Hi All,
I'm very happy to announce the availability of Simple Invoice 20060525.
The major addition in this release is the new 'Client Accounts', basically
it allows to mange/track/etc. payments customer make to you. What this
means is that in the Manage Invoices & Customers screen new columns have
been added to shown you how much of the invoice has been paid and hows much
item.author: simpleinvoices@googlegroups.com

item.title: Re: [simpleinvoices:90] Re: Problem With PDF export
item.description:
Hi Sebastian,
as your PDF works for the google example then its most likely a Simple
Invoices issues
there are 2 issues, 1 config file and 1 code
1 config:
you mentioend your using a subdomain - i'll assume its sumething like
[link] and simpleinvoices at the end ie.
[link]
item.author: simpleinvoices@googlegroups.com
